Tunable.name: DISTANCE_PER_FLOOR
Tunable.description: The cost per floor difference in the two points. Ex: if this is tuned to 50 and a Sim is trying to use an object on the third floor of their house while on the first floor, the distance estimate would be 100 meters.

Tunable.name: DISTANCE_PER_ROOM
Tunable.description: The cost per room between the points. This should be the average diameter of rooms that people tend to build.
